description: With Saydirac, you can take a photograph of a ballot, share on the internet, and count the uploaded ballots. Our goal is to help people count and watch their own votes so that the elections could be more transparent.
1haziranmetin: Saydirac will be used for the first time in Yalova and Agri local elections June 1st, 2014. Leave your email so that we cona notify you when the system is up and running.
lisans: All data collected at Saydirac.com is open for everyone to use and licensed under Creative Commons.
komut: Please enter all record data into the form by carefully going through the ballot record.
sayilariformayaz: Please carefully fill in the form below based on the ballot image.
flagnote: If the data on the image does not match the data on the form, please flag this ballot.
